title: Minecraft 1.9 更新建議
author: qazsps123
txt_content:
誰可以幫我去這網站:https://www.reddit.com/r/MinecraftSuggestions
幫我跟MOJANG建議1.9的更新內容?
只要幫我留言就好了 因為我不知道怎麼用
我試過了很多次 就是無法成功
留言內容:
I come from Taiwan.  I'm not good at English, but I hope you can be able to understand what I'm saying:

I really like this game MineCraft.  hoping to add some in this version 1.9 I want.

1. Skeleton should not swim.
2. Skeleton Shot speed change slow.
3. "§" symbol can be entered in the game.  This will reduce a lot of trouble
4. Add some blocks:
Multiple material "signs" and "chest".
(EX. "birch signs" , "birch chest")
5. Add Blood show

If you can promise me these things.  I would be very grateful for your.

Thank you~

建議的內容是:
1.骷髏不可以會游泳
2.骷髏的射擊速度減慢
3."§"符號可以輸入
4.新增一些方塊:
多種告示牌與箱子(例如:黑橡木箱子 杉木告示牌)

如果有人幫我告訴他們 請貼上網址來證明(或是拍照)
我會將你選為最佳解答

replies.author: asjkdaskljda
replies.txt_content:
完成发送
地址：https://www.reddit.com/r/minecra ... craft_19suggestion/
（ID就是OKcf所以希望采纳谢谢THANKS~)

replies.txt_content:
